statement.p: Chris is conducting market research on the cost of a touchscreen laptop computer. Chris has determined that the average cost of a touchscreen laptop computer is 1110, and that the distribution of costs is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 136.
a. Find the probability that a single randomly selected consumer spends less than 1270 on a touchscreen laptop computer.
b. The cost of the middle 70 of touchscreen laptop computers falls between (round to the nearest dollar):
c. The most expensive 11 of touchscreen laptop computers cost at least how much? (round to the nearest dollar)
